bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I make something sweet.
🌼 I help flowers grow.
💛 I am yellow and black.

bug.question: I am a small, red bug with black spots. Children sing songs about me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am considered lucky in some cultures.
🔴 I have a round shape.
🌱 I eat aphids on plants.

bug.question: I march in a line and carry crumbs back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in a colony.
💪 I am very strong for my size.
⛏️ I dig tunnels underground.

bug.question: I jump very high and am usually green. I like to eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I'm often the same color as grass.
🎶 You might hear me chirping in a field.
🌿 I can be a pest to farmers.

bug.question: I build a sticky web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home can be very intricate.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🦟 I eat flies and other small insects.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then go into a chrysalis, and finally emerge with beautiful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I am a symbol of transformation.
🐛 My first stage loves to eat leaves.
🌈 I come in many different colors and patterns.

bug.question: I light up the night with a bright glow. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I use bioluminescence to attract a mate.
🔦 I can be found in fields on warm summer nights.
🔥 My light comes from a chemical reaction.

bug.question: I make a buzzing sound, and some types bite and drink blood. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 Some say that bug spray keeps me away.
💧 I breed in stagnant water.
🌍 I can be found all over the world, except Antarctica.

bug.question: I mimic leaves for camouflage, and I can stay very still. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I look like part of a tree.
🌳 I am long and slender.
🔎 You need a keen eye to spot me.

bug.question: I have a long nose and suck nectar from flowers, but I am not a butterfly. What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ I can hover in mid-air.
➕ People often mistake me for a hummingbird. They share similar feeding styles but are very different species.
🌸 I have a very long proboscis.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts! Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am a very large animal
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia
🥜 I use my trunk to pick up food

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🐈‍⬛ I purr when I'm happy
🥛 I drink milk
🧶 I like to play with yarn

animal.question: I have a fluffy tail and I love to bury nuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ I live in trees
🌰 I gather food for the winter
🌳 You often see me in parks

animal.question: I hop around and love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I have long ears
🌱 I like to eat vegetables
🐇 I'm known for being quick

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I live in Africa
🐎 I look a bit like a horse
🎨 My stripes are unique to each individual

animal.question: I am known as the 'King of the Jungle.' Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane
🐾 I roar loudly
👑 I'm a type of big cat

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal
🌍 I live in Africa
🌿 My spots help me blend in with the trees

animal.question: I build dams and live in the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I use my teeth to cut down trees
🌊 I am a rodent
🏡 I create my own habitat

animal.question: I change colors to blend in with my surroundings. What am I?

hints.text: 🦎 I am a reptile
👁️ My eyes can move independently
🌍 I live in warm climates

animal.question: I have a pouch where I carry my young. What am I?

hints.text: 🦘 I am a marsupial
🇦🇺 I live in Australia
💪 I am known for hopping
